title: AI is not your friend
description: ZURICH, Switzerland — Meta chief Mark Zuckerberg and OpenAI’s Sam Altman have been aggressively promoting the idea that everyone, children included, should form relationships with artificial intelligence (AI) “friends” or “companions.” Meanwhile, multinational tech companies are pushing the concept of “AI agents” designed to assist us in our personal and professional lives, handle routine tasks and guide decision-making.

title: James Cameron Shares 'Terminator'-Style Vision for A.I.

content:

title: Japan tech giant SoftBank Group sees better fortunes on surging AI stocks
description: Japanese technology conglomerate SoftBank Group has reported a $2.9 billion profit for the April-June quarter, rebounding from a loss a year earlier, as its investments benefited from the craze for artificial intelligence.
